JobFullDesc: Seeking a Data Architect to join our growing team!Do you enjoy working with cutting edge technology to solve tough problems? Our technology group is comprised of deeply passionate and experienced professionals who guide clients through their most complex technology challenges. If you are seeking a role that offers you the opportunity to work with clients through critical issues, consider a career in Deloitte's Government and Public Services (GPS) Technology practice.Work you'll do:In this role, you will build custom tooling to support the analysis of legacy programs, then translate those requirements into design / implementation of APIs.Required Qualifications:4+ years' professional experience acting as a data architect Proficient in Microsoft SQL Server and T-SQL (e.g. stored procedures, functions)Understanding of design and implementation of APIs (e.g. Swagger)Ability to logically depict and understand architecture based on functional and non-functional requirements of the programExperience functionally decomposing legacy systems based on documentation and client interviewsAbility to work with clients to gain and understanding of design needs and provide recommendations based on analysisExperience building data models / design based on functional requirementsUnderstanding of SDLCBS or BA from an accredited University or College Ability to obtain a Public Trust clearanceMust be legally authorized to work in the United States without the need for employer sponsorship, now or at any time in the future.Desired Qualifications:Experience with legacy technologies (JCL, COBOL) a plusAbility to work independently with minimum supervision. The team  Deloitte's Government and Public Services (GPS) practice - our people, ideas, technology and outcomes-is designed for impact. Serving federal, state, & local government clients as well as public higher education institutions, our team of over 15,000+ professionals brings fresh perspective to help clients anticipate disruption, reimagine the possible, and fulfill their mission promise. The Systems Engineering offering is comprised of experienced professionals who help guide clients through their most complex technology challenges. This can include the delivery of large scale software applications & integrated systems, the development of service-oriented architecture (SOA) and other integrations solutions, and the delivery of technology enablement to support CIO services transformation. Our Systems Engineering offering focuses on key client issues that impact the core business, provide operational value, drive down the cost of quality, and enhance technology innovation.  How you'll grow  At Deloitte, our professional development plan focuses on helping people at every level of their career to identify and use their strengths to do their best work every day. From entry-level employees to senior leaders, we believe there's always room to learn. We offer opportunities to help sharpen skills in addition to hands-on experience in the global, fast-changing business world. From on-the-job learning experiences to formal development programs, our professionals have a variety of opportunities to continue to grow throughout their career.
